title: Harlowe Pilgrim's Oh My Words! 2014
description: The following is an album of Harlowe Pilgrim’s short works (Hey, it’s short … but it still works?) all published in 2014 and featured on Harlowe Pilgrim’s Cock and Bull Blog. The material included herein is intended for adult readers only. Not safe for work. Not safe for Grandma. Unless you work at a strip club. And your Grandma works there with you."Poking Fun", "Theatre of the Absurd", "Cemetery Play" and more!
author: Harlowe Pilgrim
